well... after i got home last nite... from max's.. My lil bro Richie tells me that Andrew... the kid that caught me and max at the lake.... told Richie what happened and Richie is threatening to tell my parents... so max and i want to run away..... we have figured out a lot of it... but not all of it.... hehehe...... and i told him if i had to "I will wait til next year to try out for American Idol".... and i was sooo surprised i said that and so was he... he knows how much i would love to be on American Idol... yet i am willing to give it up for him... I must love him a lot.... dont you think???? anywho... that is what is goin on.... max is kinda depressed as am i because we are kinda... well i am kinda scared... about all this.... i am willing to leave everything behind just to be with him..... and that is good..... well i think it is.... gotta go gotta eat FOOD!!!!!!

Well lets see.... where should i start.... first of all JOEY FINALLY READ MY EMAIL I SENT HIM LIKE A WHILE AGO...... YAY!!!!!!! he read it.... anywho.... i talked to max from like 2 this mornin to like 6:40 this mornin... YAY!!!!! :) very happy person.... i called him after i woke up which was about 10:05 this mornin.... and i called him at like... 10:25 this mornin..... joey is online.... but he has his away message on.... HMM....... wonder what the fuck he is doin....HEHEHE....... joey is weird like that god only fuckin knows what he is doin...... I blacked out last nite and i have 12 NEW lil cuts on my left wrist... i got freaked so i called max..... good thing too... because he made me feel SOOOOOOO much better..... and i guess that is all that matters.... Max is a great guy.... i dont know what i would do if i hadnt met him...... and its all becauses of Sam... thanx Sam..... Well anywho..... i just finished cleaning grams house.... which of course was the reason i spent the nite... so i could help her clean...... but anywho.... yeah well... max might come over my house today...... hehehe.... we are goin to be goin to the lake.... YAY!!!!!!!!!!!!! :: smile comes to face:: as if i didnt already have one on it... it just makes me smile more..... max really made me feel better last nite.... and i dont know what i would have done if he wasnt there for me last nite and let me cry on his shoulder (not literally speaking because we were on the phone but u know what i mean....) i told him everything that i was feeling at that exact moment.... and he listened to me and paid attention to me as if i was the only person left on this planet..... THERE IS LIFE ON THIS PLANET...... everytime i talk to him i hear this wonderful VERITY.... (mr. webster gave me that word!!!!) the sincerity in his voice tells me he is tellin me the truth in everything that he says to me.... its so sweet.... one day we are at each others throats wanting to practically stab each other  (hypothetically (BIG WORD) speaking) and the next we are dating.... how ironic (BIG WORD) is that......... well i gotta go... i want to annoy the person who is on Joey's sn and then get off and call max.... hehehe

Words of the Day: 1. Verity: truth; true statement; really existing thing
2. Zombie: dead person said to be brought to life by witchcraft

Bye guys... talk to you all soon....


I love you Max!!!! *kiss*kiss*

hey... i got grounded from the phone til tomorrow... bc i said the word "fuck" and my mom heard me..... so i am grounded from it.... ::crys softly:: today has been pretty good... last nite... my lil bro and his friends Andrew, Nick, and Jwan all went over my friend Zach's house and got like LOTS of fuckin porno's and shit... it was FUN!!!!! but anywho.... back to what i was saying.... we had fun and now i am sitting here at grams house on her puter... that i JUST FUCKIN fixed.. BY MYSELF....... but anywho..... missing max and wishing he was here with me....... i hope i get to see him tomorrow...... and we can have fun.... OH GUESS WHAT??? dont tell max... but i had this really good idea....... earlier... i cant say because i know he reads these... but it is good..... i know when July 13,2005 comes along and we are still together i will tell u.... plus he will be surprised........ its fun really it is.... it gives me a chance to tell him the feelings i feel everyday..... in a little note........ hehehe... i am not goin to say anymore....... because he will know what it is...... and i dont want that i want it to be a surprise..... anywho.... i have had so much goin on lately..... Zach gave me an invitation last nite to "fuck" him.... and i didnt do it at all.... That is good... i am learning to control myself..... which is good... and as i sit here i miss max even more..... he went out somewhere with his dad and sis and one of his dad's ex's to dinner...... OH JOY!!!!!!!! not really......... but anyway...... guess what i have the two poems i said i would post in the next few days... here they are....

Let you go

I hesitate to tell you
what's on my mind
I can't hesitate anymore
i must speak my mind
For years I have loved you
this you know
You know that I'd give up everything
for you in a heartbeat
But dispite our countless hours
on the phone
And our endless conversations
about love and marriage
I must tell you
my heart is with you
It probably always will
be with you
But I can't take it anymore
the pain, the suffering,
The anger, the depression
the emptiness, and the worthlessness
I love you
but I can't do this anymore
Your heart belongs to someone else
and I can't compete with that
I don't intend to try
what's the point?
Your ont going to wind up
picking me
As much as this hurts me
i let you go
Your free from me
love who you choose
Love me but only as your friend
which is all that I want
This is goodbye
i've let you go

and the other one.... BTW... this is not based on personal experience like all my other poems but it is still as good as the others....

Unfound Letter

I sit her in my room
and clean
As I clean
I find a letter
I sit her and read the letter
as tears stream down my face
its a love letter from you
the man I once loved
bearing all your feelings 
and laying your cards 
on the table
This letter dates back to 2002
I can't believe my eyes
as I read this beautiful confession
I sit alone in my room and cry
after reading this wonderful letter
why didn't I find it sooner
I am set to marry another man
in less than a month
For I had thought
you had forgotten about me
So I moved on
and now this....
I call you
to tell you I found your letter
You respond with "You did"
and "it took you this long?"
You tell me that your still available
I tell you "I'm getting married"
I hear your voice crak
I know your crying
I told you I didn't know 
anything about this letter
until now
I thought you had forgotten
about me
So i decided to move on
I hear you cry
I tell you i have found someone else
you cry more
It hurts me to make you cry
I tell you I will always love you
I tell you my sinful confessions
You know now
the truth
I moved on
because of an 
Unfound Letter


I hope you liked my poems.... Comment if u like on them....

Bye guys.....

hey guys.... wow.... last nite was amazing.... but i dont know how to feel today...... max went over Corey's house... with corey and taylor... the twinkie churchy taylor... he is supposed to be home by like 9 he said.... last nite after i posted my update... max and i went back to the corner.... and had MORE "fun".... and it was fun.... even if we didnt do what we did... i still would have had fun... because i was with him.... my parents dont want me dating rite now... and i dont care... i love max.... and i cant tell them that..... because they would say "oh and you LOVED philip too and that 22 yr. old guy, and you really LOVE joey.... what makes you think you love max??" i hate for them to feel this way.... but i dont really fuckin care.... i love max... fuck joey... max makes me feel different..... and i like it.. he can put a smile on my face no matter what.. and i love it... i love how caring he is of me and how sincere he is when he says " i love you" max is this amazing person.... i am glad i met him because if i didnt i probably would be dead rite now... because i couldnt have joey.... but max saved me... he is like my angel... only he isnt quite an angel... he is my strength... and my sheild from all the world.. when i am with him i feel special... and i like feeling that way.... he treats me like i am the most beautiful person in the world... even though i think i am not that beautiful person he thinks i am.... :: crys softly :: yeah i am crying but these are happy tears i cry.... for max is my one true love.... and i am glad to say that i love him and will do anything to be with him.... last nite when i was giving him a taste of "fun" he told me something i never thought my ears would ever hear.... he told me " i want to make love to you!" and i almost cried... to know that someone out there feels the same way about me as i do about them.... and i wanted to cry.... that made me feel like everything in the world was gone but me and him... and i felt this amazing feeling inside... that everything was going to be alright and its because of max..... thanks to him i am still alive and i am here to tell the world this.... i dont feel lonely anymore... i dont feel worthless and i dont feel incomplete.... nor do i feel empty and its because of max.... Baby... you make me feel like this beautiful person when i am with you... i feel like i am myself again and this makes me happier... because i can be me and you love me for it... like joey wouldnt if he knew what i am.... and i am glad that you came into my life and fell in love with me... i dont feel like a worthless piece of shit anymore max.... and i thank you max... every day i count my lucky stars that i met you..... and it feels so good that i cant even TRY to explain it... but i love you and i always will.... well i am going to go now.... i have to go home... I love you max..... *kisses you sweetly*

the last thread of my heart has been cut... the one person i TRUELY love, JOEY, has given his heart to someone else... a BIMBO to be exact.... and i feel like i am sooo completely empty.. and it hurts me..... i want to die... MAX doesnt want me to die... because as he says "if you die i die, and if i die SAM dies, and if she dies RAY will die..." and i dont want to kill anyone else and i am so confused.... i thought love was supposed to be a GOOD FUCKIN THING... but its not... i want to just die... i feel like i have been shot by JOEY... and i hate this feeling... i guess i just wasnt quick enough to get him... because i HESITATED...... and it sux even more..... because its MY fault JOEY doesnt want to be with me.... and i dont like it... i dont want to hurt MAX and SAM .... nor do i want to hurt anyone else but me.... i am going to cut myself tonite... after i get off of here.... and guess what... its going to be fun.... hopefully i will die and wont have to live the rest of my life without JOEY.... i dont want to think about that... but its something i must face at some point in time.... dont u think.... oh btw... here is a song i wrote for JOEY..... 

Death is Better than....

Verse 1

I feel empty
like a blackhole has consumed me
I feel as if the one person I love
has pushed me off the edge of the cliff 
I am now stranded on this desert isle

Chours 1

the death sounds better than bearing
this fucking pain I hold the knife
steady and almost ready to get
away from this hell of a life

heart the trigger was pulled the
bullet released the bullet penetrated 
what once was my heart yet i still
survived the bullet may be gone, but
the pain lives on in my heart

Chours 1

Verse 3

the one who pushed me off 
the cliff and stranded me on this island
knows i'm alive, but only just

threads of my heart every second i 
am not with him is like another 
thread is cut and he moves a step
closer to falling in love with another

Chours 2

another minute alive is another chance 
to fuck up i sway the knife
on my wrist thinking of all the 
fuck ups I've had why live
so I can have more?

Verse 4

The one I love I feel I've lost
Its like I'm climbing a wall
that stands between us and 
I have two choices I can either 
fall and let myself die or keep
going knowing he's on the other side
waiting for me to climb over and jump
so he can catch me in his arms

Chours 1

Bridge

After four years of knowing 
him I grew to love him from the 
moment we met til now four
years later my love grew stronger
every day with him I dont feel
empty or worthless but complete
All my anger and sadness would fade
as soon as i heard his voice I want
to feel complete again and to
be with him forever.......

Verse 5

I've found what I seek in him
He has heard my cry he has seen
the smoke signals I've made
he has caught me after I jumped
from the wall and has carried me
away I have won the pain is gone
I am complete once again
I am happy and I have my happily
ever after

Chours 3 

Death was so close yet so far
the death is not better then the

pain and sadness and hello to 
a new life
